Room.Name: Regalia Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Regalia Way, just southwest of the Allisk Circle.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the odd Allisk Circle to the northeast. A strange feeling comes over you as you stare in that direction, almost as if you were being watched. The Allisk Manor extends as far as the Allisk Circle. Both Lankshire Parkway and Hillcrest Drive form the Manor's deathly boundaries.
